description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter application, defining the main widget structure including the MaterialApp, a StatefulWidget for the home page, and a basic loading UI with a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Stateless widget serving as the root of the app, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a customizable title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI presentation for MyHomePage.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, defining the UI layout.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
